# Abundant Ammunition (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]]) 

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a single piece of ammunition)

**Target:** One container touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 222

When cast on a container such as a quiver or a pouch that contains nonmagical ammunition or shuriken (including masterwork ammunition or shuriken), at the start of each round this spell replaces any ammunition taken from the container the round before. The ammunition taken from the container the round before vanishes. If, after casting this spell, you cast a spell that enhances projectiles, such as *[[Align Weapon (Spell)|align weapon]]* or *[[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|greater magic weapon]]*, on the same container, all projectiles this spell conjures are affected by that spell.
#Spell-Resistance/No #Spell-Level/Assassin-1 #Sources/Ultimate-Combat #Spell-Level/Bard-1 #Spell-Level/Cleric-1 #Spell-School/Conjuration #Saving-Throws/None #Spell-Level/Ranger-1 #Spell-Level/Sorcerer-Wizard-1 #Spell-Subschool/Summoning

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1, Psychic 1 to Level.

Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
